source.name: Using our fine-tune model
source.instructions: **Fill in the blank with the right symbol to make the statement true.**
source.text: Remember that the prompt has to end with the indicator string <<< -> >>> for the model to start generating completions.
source.guidance: Keep in mind, after fine-tuning a model, ensure that your prompt concludes with the signal string `->`. This is necessary for triggering the model to commence completion generation, as opposed to extending the prompt further.

text: Remember that the prompt has to end with the indicator string
for the model to start generating completions.
